headline: Is Digital Realty (DLR) Pricing Look Attractive After Recent Multi Year Share Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Digital Realty Trust is priced attractively right now, it helps to start by lining up its recent share performance against what you are getting for that price. The stock last closed at US$171.62, with returns of 3.4% over the past week, 8.2% over the last 30 days, 10.7% year to date, 5.3% over 1 year, 70.7% over 3 years and 45.7% over 5 years. Recent attention on Digital Realty Trust has focused on how investors are weighing its position in data center real...
